show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita in the New Haunts of Evil - Peko and the Five Explore
other_title: Doraemon - Le avventure di Nobita e dei cinque esploratori (Italian)
Doraemon Nobita thám hiểm vùng đất mới - Peko và 5 nhà thám hiểm
Eiga Doraemon: Shin Nobita no Daimakyō - Peko to 5-nin no Tankentai (Japanese)
映画ドラえもん 新・のび太の大魔境 ～ペコと5人の探検隊～ (Japanese)
电影哆啦A梦：新·大雄的大魔境 ～贝可与5人探险队～ (Chinese (PRC))
電影哆啦A夢：新·大雄的大魔境 ～扁扁與5人之探險隊～ (Chinese (Taiwan))
電影多啦A夢：新·大雄的大魔境 ～柏高與5人之探險隊～ (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: Nobita finds a lost white dog whom he names Peko while his friends desire an adventure somewhere that still hasn´t been explored during their Summer vacation. After some research the five friends and the dog end up going deep into an African jungle just to find out that Peko has a mysterious connection with their destination.
ending_theme: "Hikari no Signal (光のシグナル;Signal of Light)" by Kis-My-Ft2
